body: Cloistered clerics are proficient with light armor and with the following weapons: club, heavy mace, light mace, quarterstaff, and sling. They are not proficient with shields.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Cleric/Cleric Archetypes/Cloistered Cleric/Weapon and Armor Proficiency
name: Weapon and Armor Proficiency
